documentation.text:
@dev Submit identity hash for verification
 @param _identityHash SHA-256 hash of identity data (computed client-side)

@dev Get identity record for a given address
 @param _user Wallet address to query
@dev Check if an address is verified (quick boolean check)
@dev Get total number of verified identities

getIdentity(address).details: Get identity record for a given address

getTotalVerified().details: Get total number of verified identities

isVerified(address).details: Check if an address is verified (quick boolean check)

params._identityHash: SHA-256 hash of identity data (computed client-side)
